detail_desc: Short, straight-cut dress in airy jersey made from a linen blend with short sleeves.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem, and a decorative bow at the front of the hem.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem, and a decorative bow at the front of the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and press-studs on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Dress in softly draping, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with gathers for added width and soft draping. Lined.

Dress in softly draping, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with gathers for added width and soft draping. Lined.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts with straps in an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit in soft jersey with buttons at the top, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts in an airy textured weave with patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and straps that cross at the back and button at the front.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.

Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Non-wired push-up bra in lace and mesh with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Trousers in soft, patterned, thermal fleece with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and wrapover front. Elastication at the back of the waistband and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, gently flared skirt in soft viscose jersey with smocking at the top. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a heavily draping rib knit with a collar, V-neck, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Long, straight-style waistcoat woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and patch front pockets. Gently tapered waist. Unlined.
